title: GFunds
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

**Get Started with GFunds**

- [How can I apply for GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017753033-How-can-I-apply-for-GFunds)
- [What is the Risk Profile Questionnaire (RPQ) in GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900004631723-What-is-the-Risk-Profile-Questionnaire-RPQ-in-GFunds)
- [What investment products are available on GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/5951847409049-What-investment-products-are-available-on-GFunds)
- [Does GFunds have a minimum maintaining balance to keep funds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30839343392153-Does-GFunds-have-a-minimum-maintaining-balance-to-keep-funds)
- [What are the GFunds fees I need to know about?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30841717008025-What-are-the-GFunds-fees-I-need-to-know-about)
[See all 6 articles](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/30828845027225-Get-Started-with-GFunds)

**Buy and Sell funds with GFunds**

- [How can I buy funds in GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/5351243796377-How-can-I-buy-funds-in-GFunds)
- [How can I sell/withdraw funds from GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30843460974489-How-can-I-sell-withdraw-funds-from-GFunds)
- [How do I schedule automatic investments in GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30844023946137-How-do-I-schedule-automatic-investments-in-GFunds)
- [How do I track my pending Buy and Sell orders in GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900004505786-How-do-I-track-my-pending-Buy-and-Sell-orders-in-GFunds)
- [When will I receive my GFunds Buy or Sell orders?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900004505746-When-will-I-receive-my-GFunds-Buy-or-Sell-orders)

**Manage your GFunds Account**

- [How do I close my GFunds account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30844779903897-How-do-I-close-my-GFunds-account)
- [How do I update my account information in GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005381886-How-do-I-update-my-account-information-in-GFunds)

**Get Help with GFunds**

- [My Sell Order has not been reflected in my GFunds account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/41040351575833-My-Sell-Order-has-not-been-reflected-in-my-GFunds-account-What-do-I-do)
- [I can’t buy or sell funds in GFunds. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/35735707460505-I-can-t-buy-or-sell-funds-in-GFunds-What-do-I-do)
- [I can’t open a GFunds account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30845311649561-I-can-t-open-a-GFunds-account-What-do-I-do)
- [I can’t access my GFunds account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30845136114201-I-can-t-access-my-GFunds-account-What-do-I-do)
- [Why am I not qualified for GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30845376740249-Why-am-I-not-qualified-for-GFunds)
[See all 6 articles](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/30830586318745-Get-Help-with-GFunds)

[Are there funds on GFunds that pay dividends?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4414649972505-Are-there-funds-on-GFunds-that-pay-dividends)
